title: Nigotta Hitomi no Lilianne - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Shoujo Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Beastkin   Blind Protagonist   Child Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cute Story   Determined Protagonist   Disabilities   Doting Older Siblings   Easy Going Life   Eye Powers   Fairies   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Hiding True Abilities   Knights   Magic   Maids   Male to Female   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Sister Complex   Special Abilities
author: Tenkai   天界
description:
After coming out of a tunnel… it was pitch dark.

When I awoke, it was pitch dark.

First, I need to grasp the situation… While lost in thought, white, foggy figures appeared, and as usual, it was utterly dark, just what is happening?

When I noticed, I reincarnated!

Moreover, my gender has changed!?

God, don't people normally get a supernatural ability when reincarnating!?

Isn’t this conversely a start with a handicap!>
